alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 4:43AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF UNCOMPAHGRE PLATEAU/DALLAS DIVIDE...GRAND VALLEY...AND ARCHES/GRAND FLAT COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 441 AM MST, a band of heavy snow was 15 miles north of Moab and extended to 8 miles northwest of Fruita, or 17 miles northwest of Grand Junction. The heavy snow band was nearly stationary. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Fruita, Mack, Cisco and Loma. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 1 and 19. Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 195 and 231. Utah 128 between mile markers 35 and 44. Colorado 139 between mile markers 1 and 11. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
